snippet.title: Rebuild
snippet.description:
Rebuild is a turn-based strategy game set in the zombie apocalypse.

You lead a group of survivors and defend your fort against undead attacks. Reclaim one building at a time and put your survivors to work scavenging for food, building houses, rediscovering technology and of course killing zombies.

Beware of rival gangs, illness, thieves and even riots as you rebuild a city in this post apocalyptic turn based strategy game.

Rebuild is available on your favorite mobile devices.  Check it out today!

App Links:

Rebuild Official site:
http://rebuildgame.com

Rebuild on iTunes (iPhone, iPad, iPod touch): 
http://tinyurl.com/RebuildIOS

Rebuild on Google Play (Android):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.sarahnorthway.rebuild2

Rebuild on BlackBerry AppWorld (PlayBook):
http://appworld.blackberry.com/webstore/content/97235/?lang=en

Rebuild on Amazon Appstore (Android & Kindle Fire):
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007V7NMO6


Links:

Developer Homepage - http://sarahnorthway.com/
My Homepage - http://www.rgddesigns.com

Song - Strange by Matt Menovcik; Audio file(s) provided by http://www.audiomicro.com
